attributes.action: Ban Dodgy Willdrafters and online Will Making Companys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you are thinking of drawing up your will so that you can look after your loved ones when you are gone.
 Think twice before you ask any tom dick or harry to sort it out for you,
anyone can claim to be able to do this but the only Safe way is to use a Solicitor or expert in will drafting.
 Take it from someone who has been shafted... 
 Before you ask no i am not a solicitor.
A Solicitor is more likely to read through relevant laws and advise you otherwise.
 You may think that what you are asking for is all well and good but once your loved ones are gone it is too late to change things......

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
